attributes.action: Allow fully vaccinated travellers from red list countries to home quarantine.
attributes.additional_details: Parliament needs to take this seriously and need to consider the hassle of fully vaccinated UK residents to pay extra for hotel quarantine to visit their loved ones in their home country. In this situation, it would be easier for the UK residents who need to visit their families in their home country.
attributes.background: The government needs to make changes to the quarantine system for red list countries as the situation here in the UK is changing. The majority of the adults in the UK have been fully vaccinated.
